content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I am on a tight budget. I was hoping for something around 500 euros per month.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 500 euros per month is quite low for an apartment of this quality in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my expenses and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to pay a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Of course, I can understand your position. How about 600 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 600 euros per month is more in line with what I had in mind. However, I'm willing to offer you a one-time discount of 50 euros if you're willing to sign a two-year lease. That would bring the monthly rent to 595 euros. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds fair, but I was hoping for a little bit lower price. How about 580 euros per month?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, 580 euros per month is quite a bit lower than my initial offer. Could you perhaps meet me halfway at 590 euros per month? This is a very fair price considering the location and the amenities. And with the one-time discount, you're looking at a very competitive rate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, I agree to the price of 590 euros per month!
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 590 euros per month! Thank you for your understanding, Emilia. I'm sure you'll find the apartment a great place to live. Let's proceed with the lease agreement, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, that would be great. I am looking forward to moving in. Let's say I sign a two-year lease. Do you offer any additional benefits or discounts for a longer lease?
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Emilia, as a gesture of goodwill and to encourage long-term tenancy, I am willing to waive the security deposit for you if you sign a two-year lease. This is a significant savings, as the deposit would otherwise be equal to two months' rent. Additionally, I promise to cover the cost of any minor maintenance issues that may arise during the lease term. How does this sound to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds like a fair deal. I agree to the price of 590 euros per month and the additional benefits for the two-year lease.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 590 euros per month and the additional benefits for the two-year lease. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
